quote: Do the things that make you happy, wellness will follow.
author: Kelli Anderson

quote: We eat our feelings, stress, and pain; It's not just about what's on our plates. Take time to love yourself.
author: Kelli Anderson

quote: To experience peace does not mean that your life is always blissful. It means that you are capable of tapping into a blissful state of mind amidst the normal chaos of a hectic life.
author: Jill Bolte Taylor

quote: It’s not selfish to love yourself, take care of yourself, and to make your happiness a priority. It’s necessary.
author: Mandy Hale

quote: To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: When you recover or discover something that nourishes your soul and brings joy, care enough about yourself to make room for it in your life.
author: Jean Shinoda Bolen

quote: Sometimes the most important thing in a whole day is the rest we take between two deep breaths.
author: Etty Hillesum

quote: How we care for ourselves gives our brain messages that shape our self-worth so we must care for ourselves in every way, every day.
author: Sam Owen

quote: Caring for myself is not self-indulgence, it is self-preservation, and that is an act of political warfare.
author: Audre Lorde
